title: About
text:
What does AIS Doctor offer?
AIS Doctor offers customized data scraping and analysis consulting services for young scholars, Ph.D.Â students, and small businesses. We have a dedicated team consisted of data scientists, professors in data analytics and information system. We will take care of your needs and help you move forward with your project.
Browse our sample projects for more info.


Specializations include:

Data Scraping/Crawling using R or Python
Data Analysis & modeling
Statistical modeling
Short courses and workshops for business professionals
Independent research/analysis




 

Background

Extensive training and experience in analytics research, teaching, and outreach
Authors/co-authors of over 40 peer-reviewed articles focusing on applied consulting research



Want to get started on a project?
Schedule a 30-minute call with AIS Doctor so we can learn more about your project.
